name: Creamy Chicken Alfredo
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with creamy Alfredo sauce and tender chicken pieces.

name: Spicy Thai Curry
description: A flavorful Thai curry made with a variety of spices, coconut milk, and your choice of protein or vegetables.

name: Mediterranean Veggie Bake
description: A vegetarian dish featuring a variety of Mediterranean vegetables baked to perfection with herbs and olive oil.

name: Honey Glazed Salmon
description: Salmon fillets brushed with a sweet and tangy honey glaze, then baked or grilled until flaky and delicious.

name: Zesty Lemon Chicken
description: Chicken breasts marinated in a zesty lemon marinade and grilled or baked to juicy perfection.

name: Classic Beef Stew
description: A hearty stew made with tender chunks of beef, potatoes, carrots, and onions simmered in a rich and flavorful broth.

name: Garlic Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp cooked in a garlic-infused butter sauce, typically served over pasta or with crusty bread for dipping.

name: Veggie Stir-Fry
description: A quick and healthy dish made by stir-frying a variety of vegetables in a flavorful sauce, often served over rice or noodles.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar

name: Teriyaki Tofu Bowl
description: A vegetarian bowl featuring crispy tofu tossed in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with rice and steamed vegetables.

name: Butternut Squash Risotto
description: Creamy risotto made with arborio rice and roasted butternut squash, finished with Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
description: Slow-cooked pork shoulder, shredded and mixed with barbecue sauce, then served on a bun with coleslaw or pickles.
